--- # title: "People you meet along the initiative" page-layout: full title-block-banner: true --- :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"} Harnessing modern data tools allows us to access unparalleled opportunities to tackle important societal issues and create impactful change worldwide. ::: ::: {.column width="40%"} Pause for a moment and ***Join us*** ::: :::: ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Mr. Masumbuko Semba ![](resources/semba.png) **Role**: Mentor Semba works at the [Nelson Mandela African Institution of Science and Technology]{style="background: #433E49; color: #ABDFF1"}. He use programming language like R and Python to manage and analyse data and report using Web Applications, Website or blogs. Semba also design graphics and automate plots, maps for static and interactive document. [lugosemba@gmail.com]{style="color: #0069BF;"} [ +255 717 603 703]{style="color: #0069BF;"} ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Ms. Nyamisi Peter ![](resources/michi-ofisi.png) **Role**: Mentor Nyamisi works at [University of Dar es Salaam]{style="background: #433E49; color: #ABDFF1"}. She is phytoplankton exeprt using earth observation data and automate data acquisation, process, analyse. She is excellent in using quarto that combine R codes and text to automate generation of technical documents in word, pdf or html formats. [nyamisip@gmail.com]{style="color: #0069BF;"} [+255 717 516 711]{style="color: #0069BF;"} ::: ::: ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Mr. Kassim Said ![](resources/kassim.png) **Role**: Mentee Kassim is an accountant and financial analyst. He works as an accountant at Letshego Faidika Bank and as a financial consultant at Asasi ya Uwezeshaji Tanzania under the USAID Heshimu Bahari Project. [kassim.salum@asuta.or.tz ]{style="color: #0069BF;"} [+255 743 956 226]{style="color: #0069BF;"} ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Mr. Kessy Revocatus ![](resources/kessy.png) **Role**: Mentor Kessy Revocatus is a mathematician current teaches at Hannah Bennie Schools School. Recognizing the role of data in driving business, he is learning R programming to automate data analysis, model and reporting. [kessyluhegaa@gmail.com ]{style="color: #0069BF;"} [+255 711 396 392]{style="color: #0069BF;"} ::: ::: ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Mr. Barakael Matulu ![](resources/barakael.png) **Role**: Mentee Barakael works on the USAID Heshimu Bahari Project. He is an aquatic ecologist with interests in marine resources management and climate change issues. Recently, he has also developed an interest in automating data acquisition, processing, analysis, and reporting in R, as well as graphic design.
